name: COTY
headAddress: COTY S.A.S. 14 rue du Quatre Septembre
membership: Active Corporate Member of Cosmetics Europe, and of a majority of cosmetic industry associations at national level in the European Union.
goal:
Coty is a world leading beauty company making cosmetic, skincare, fragrances, hair color and styling brands loved by many. As a challenger, we want to positively disrupt the beauty industry we see today. We believe passionately that the beauty of humanity lies in the individuality of people, and is at its best when authentic. We want a more radically inclusive attitude to beauty, that lets people express their
beauty, their way. We exist to celebrate and liberate the diversity of your beauty.
interests: Communication, Consumers, Environment, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Cosmetic Products Regulation (EC) No 1223/2009, and all amendments thereto.
Regulation (EC) No 1272/2008 on the classification, labelling and packaging of substances and mixtures (CLP Regulation), and the classification thereunder of
substances used in cosmetic products.
Inter-institutional Agreement on Better Law-making.
